CustomField.description: Identifies the workflow email alert to use to notify customer when a case related to an 'AusPost' product has been closed as a result of receiving this event message. Applicable only when IsCaseClosureEligible__c = true.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the workflow email alert to use to notify customer when a case related to an 'AusPost' product has been closed as a result of receiving this event message.
CustomField.label: Case Closure Email Alert Name AusPost
